text:
I'm not sure what the patch provides.
Are you fixing a bug? are you addressing a security or performance issue?
If so please specify that. Otherwise, we'll close it. We get many code police bug, that don't change anything in our system. We're happy to review real issues, so please reopen this issue with the reason for the patch, what functionality changes it addresses other than eclipse or other tool warnings.
creator: fhanik@apache.org
markt@apache.org
text:
The patch is bad. It causes an exception to be thrown, even if forcing the task onto the queue was successful.

I've applied the scope changes to trunk but they won't be ported to 6.0.x.
